title: Miles Davis - Ascenseur Pour L'Ã‰chafaud (1958) [Complete]
description:
Miles Davis' moody, evocative soundtrack for the Louis Malle movie Ã¢â‚¬Å“Ascenseur Pour LÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Ãƒâ€°chafaudÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (Lift To The Scaffold), released in 1958, comes in two different forms on this 2003 reissue. Tracks 1 - 10, which comprise the body of the original release, complete with the odd dollop of post-production echo to italicize the film's dramatic content, and there is a chronological sketch pad of tracks which didn't appear in the original release, or appeared in altered form. Recorded on December 4 & 5, 1957 in Paris, the music for the film has an elegant, romantic air to it. In the company of such French jazzmen as Pierre Michelot and tenor saxophonist Barney Wilen, this soundtrack is something of a throwback to the feel of Miles' early '50s Blue Note recordings with drummer Kenny Clarke. Rarely has Miles' open tone been more poignant. This edition is unavailable in the U.S.!
